name: Fluffy Climb Ball
description:
"Fluffy Climb Ball" is our first submission for Mini Jam (#123) using Godot 3.5.

In this game, you're a cute circle that has to jump over platforms of different sizes and movements. Your objective is to survive all the time that you can without falling off the screen. Use the platforms to gain more time, and replenish your available jumps!

We designed this videogame having the limitation "There is no ground" in mind.

Controls

  • For Mobile:
    • Tap anywhere on the screen to drag and drop your circle, you can stick to the platforms and avoid falling off them because it will be a game over!
  • For Desktop:
    • Click anywhere on the screen to drag and drop your circle, you can stick to the platforms and avoid falling off them because it will be a game over!

Credits

A game by @Framfra and @Enzitoc
